name: Evoker
proficiencies: Saving Throw: INT +7 | Saving Throw: WIS +5 | Skill: Arcana +7 | Skill: History +7

special_abilities.name: Spellcasting.
special_abilities.desc: The evoker is a 12th-level spellcaster. Its spellcasting ability is Intelligence (spell save DC 15, +7 to hit with spell attacks). The evoker has the following wizard spells prepared:

special_abilities.name: Sculpt Spells.
special_abilities.desc: When the evoker casts an evocation spell that forces other creatures it can see to make a saving throw, it can choose a number of them equal to 1 + the spell’s level. These creatures automatically succeed on their saving throws against the spell. If a successful save means a chosen creature would take half damage from the spell, it instead takes no damage from it.

actions.name: Quarterstaff.
actions.desc: Melee Weapon Attack: +3 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. Hit: 2 (1d6 – 1) bludgeoning damage, or 3 (1d8 – 1) bludgeoning damage if used with two hands.
